courses.title: Surah Al-Mulk
courses.description: Dive into Surah Al-Mulk with this course covering its context, meanings, and lessons.

lessons.name: Introduction to Surah Al-Mulk
lessons.content: This lesson introduces Surah Al-Mulk, its significance, and historical context.

lessons.name: Significance of Surah Al-Mulk
lessons.content: Exploring the significance and the key messages of Surah Al-Mulk.

lessons.name: Analysis of Verses 1-10
lessons.content: This lesson dives into the first ten verses of Surah Al-Mulk, exploring their meanings and implications.

lessons.name: Themes and Lessons
lessons.content: Discussion on the themes and lessons derived from these verses.

courses.title: Surah 2
courses.description: Explore the second Surah with comprehensive analysis and interpretation.

lessons.name: Overview of Surah 2
lessons.content: An overview of Surah 2, covering its main themes and historical background.

lessons.name: Historical Context
lessons.content: Understanding the historical context of Surah 2.

lessons.name: Detailed Study of Key Verses
lessons.content: A detailed study of key verses from Surah 2, understanding their deeper meanings.

lessons.name: Application of Lessons
lessons.content: How the lessons from these verses can be applied today.
